title: Gather Requirements
description: Conduct interviews and workshops with stakeholders to understand the organization's structure, roles, and career paths.

title: Define Data Model
description: Design the data model to represent the organization's structure, roles, career paths, and their relationships. Consider factors such as scalability, performance, ease of querying, and data integrity constraints. This model should be designed with future expansions in mind, ensuring flexibility and adaptability.

title: Develop Backend
description: Implement the backend logic to manage and retrieve the career path data.

title: Develop Frontend
description: Design and implement the user interface for visualizing and exploring career paths.

title: Implement Security with Enhancements for Improved Data Privacy
description: Ensure data privacy and access control for sensitive career path information. This includes implementing authentication and authorization mechanisms using industry-standard protocols like OAuth 2.0 and JSON Web Tokens (JWT), data encryption at rest and in transit using strong ciphers like AES-256, secure communication protocols like HTTPS with up-to-date TLS versions, regular security audits and vulnerability assessments using automated tools and manual penetration testing, secure coding practices like input validation, output encoding, and protection against common web vulnerabilities like XSS, CSRF, and SQL injection. To further enhance data privacy, consider implementing features such as role-based access control (RBAC), IP address restriction for login attempts, and user session management for idle logouts or timeouts. Lastly, update the project documentation to clearly outline the implemented security measures.

title: Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Develop test plans and execute testing for the application's functionality and usability.

title: Documentation
description: Create user guides and technical documentation for the application.

title: Deployment and DevOps
description: Set up the infrastructure and automate the deployment process for the application.
